title: GET_VEHICLE_CAUSE_OF_DESTRUCTION
content:
0xE495D1EF4C91FD200x7F8C20DD// GetVehicleCauseOfDestruction
Hash GET_VEHICLE_CAUSE_OF_DESTRUCTION(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to get the cause of destruction of.Returns: A hash representing the destruction cause. These can be weapon hashes.Examples:Lualocal destructionCauseHash = GetVehicleCauseOfDestruction(GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), true))
if destructionCauseHash == GetHashKey("weapon_stickybomb") then
     -- It looks like the vehicle was destroyed by a sticky bomb
     Citizen.Trace('Vehicle was destroyed by a sticky bomb!')
elseif destructionCauseHash ~= 0 then
     -- It looks like the vehicle was destroyed by something else!
     Citizen.Trace('Vehicle was destroyed by: ' .. destructionCauseHash)
end
codeBlocks:
local destructionCauseHash = GetVehicleCauseOfDestruction(GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), true))
if destructionCauseHash == GetHashKey("weapon_stickybomb") then
     -- It looks like the vehicle was destroyed by a sticky bomb
     Citizen.Trace('Vehicle was destroyed by a sticky bomb!')
elseif destructionCauseHash ~= 0 then
     -- It looks like the vehicle was destroyed by something else!
     Citizen.Trace('Vehicle was destroyed by: ' .. destructionCauseHash)
end
